description: Lenart Kova discovers Halden’s hidden system diagrams and annotated code in Tower 9, quietly delivering them to Oksana Lintz to avoid Council detection.

Lintz and Kova analyze the diagrams and realize they describe an undocumented BCI rollback protocol capable of correcting corrupted privilege data but requiring swift, covert execution to avoid Directorate interference.
Kova and Lintz urge immediate activation of the protocol, facing fierce resistance from Directorate members who warn of losing all system control if errors spread unchecked.
Amid deepening civic instability, Lintz and Kova secretly trigger the rollback protocol. BCI scoring and privileges begin a mass reversion, impacting all social tiers and former ghost citizens alike.

Residents across Stenograd experience sudden, unexplained shifts in their BCI status—ghosts regain former privileges, while some established citizens face unexpected restrictions—sparking public confusion and renewed political turmoil.
